name: Scorpion Overdrive
storyline: Descend to an alien planet where you will steal the planets most valuable resource, while hordes of giant alien bugs sting, stab, claw and shock you to no end. You must hold them back from destroying the equipment and somehow stay alive to enjoy a nice payday.
summary: Scorpion Overdrive is a fast paced, third person shooter, combined with tower defense style turrets and weapon placements. Enemies spawn in furious hordes as you gun them down and strategically place turrets and traps to help cover you and your equipment.
